pilots.name: Kylo Ren

shipAbility.name: Heavy Weapon Turret
shipAbility.text: You can rotate your [Single Turret Arc] indicator only to your [Front Arc] or [Rear Arc]. You must treat the [Front Arc] requirement of your equipped [Missile] upgrades as [Single Turret Arc].

pilots.ability: Before an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc] is dealt a facedown damage card, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, that damage card is dealt faceup instead.
pilots.caption: Supreme Leader of the First Order

pilots.name: “Wrath”

shipAbility.name: Heavy Weapon Turret
shipAbility.text: You can rotate your [Single Turret Arc] indicator only to your [Front Arc] or [Rear Arc]. You must treat the [Front Arc] requirement of your equipped [Missile] upgrades as [Single Turret Arc].

pilots.ability: After you perform a [Bullseye Arc] attack, if you have 1 or more non-lock red or orange tokens, you may perform a bonus attack against a different target.
pilots.caption: Herald of Destruction

pilots.name: “Nightfall”

shipAbility.name: Heavy Weapon Turret
shipAbility.text: You can rotate your [Single Turret Arc] indicator only to your [Front Arc] or [Rear Arc]. You must treat the [Front Arc] requirement of your equipped [Missile] upgrades as [Single Turret Arc].

pilots.ability: After you fully execute a maneuver or perform a [Boost] action, each ship you moved through gains 2 jam tokens.
pilots.caption: 709th Legion Veteran

pilots.name: “Whirlwind”

shipAbility.name: Heavy Weapon Turret
shipAbility.text: You can rotate your [Single Turret Arc] indicator only to your [Front Arc] or [Rear Arc]. You must treat the [Front Arc] requirement of your equipped [Missile] upgrades as [Single Turret Arc].

pilots.ability: Before you engage, you may remove any number of jam tokens, then you may gain 1 focus token for each enemy ship that has you in its [Front Arc].
pilots.caption: Reap What You Sow

pilots.name: 709th Legion Ace

shipAbility.name: Heavy Weapon Turret
shipAbility.text: You can rotate your [Single Turret Arc] indicator only to your [Front Arc] or [Rear Arc]. You must treat the [Front Arc] requirement of your equipped [Missile] upgrades as [Single Turret Arc].

pilots.text: Commanded by Supreme Leader Kylo Ren, the 709th Legion fights without mercy or remorse to crush the Resistance and bring the galaxy under the First Order's dominion.

pilots.name: Red Fury Zealot

shipAbility.name: Heavy Weapon Turret
shipAbility.text: You can rotate your [Single Turret Arc] indicator only to your [Front Arc] or [Rear Arc]. You must treat the [Front Arc] requirement of your equipped [Missile] upgrades as [Single Turret Arc].

pilots.text: Also called Red Fury, the 709th Legion is charged by Supreme Leader Kylo Ren with rooting out dissenters at Black Spire Outpost.
